statement.text: A target FICO<sup>®</sup> Score 8 of 659 could not be met within 6 months, but could be met within 9 months with the following actions:

actions.text: Pay down $100 of your total revolving/open account balances of $4,500 every month for 9 months.
Pay all your bills on time for 9 months.
Stay current on your payments so that your most recent delinquency ages to 1 year, 3 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that your average length of established history ages to 5 years, 2 months.
Do not apply for any new credit.
